operation.name: addPushpin
operation.description: Adds a pushpin to the map based on latitude and longitude.

input.name: latitude
input.description: The pushpin's latitude

input.name: longitude
input.description: The pushpin's longitude

input.name: url
input.description: The URL used for the pushpin's image

input.name: title
input.description: The pushpin's title

input.name: description
input.description: The pushpin's description
input.defaultValue: This is a pushpin on the earth.

input.name: centerMapOnPushpin
input.description: Setting this value to true will center the map when a pushpin is added. If it is false then the map will centered at 0,0.

operation.name: addPushpinByLocation
operation.description: Adds a pushpin to the map based on a location (described in a single string).

input.name: location
input.description: The place you are looking for.

input.name: url
input.description: The URL used for the pushpin's image

input.name: title
input.description: The pushpin's title

input.name: description
input.description: The pushpin's description
input.defaultValue: This is a pushpin on the earth.

input.name: centerMapOnPushpin
input.description: Setting this value to true will center the map when a pushpin is added. If it is false then the map will centered at 0,0.

input.name: maxLocations
input.description: Maximum number of locations to return

operation.name: addPushpinByAddress
operation.description: Adds a pushpin to the map based on an address (address/city/state/zip/country).

input.name: street
input.description: Street address

input.name: address2
input.description: Street address

input.name: city
input.description: City

input.name: state
input.description: State

input.name: country
input.description: Country or region

input.name: zipCode
input.description: Postal code

input.name: url
input.description: The URL used for the pushpin's image

input.name: title
input.description: The pushpin's title

input.name: description
input.description: The pushpin's description
input.defaultValue: This is a pushpin on the earth.

input.name: centerMapOnPushpin
input.description: Setting this value to true will center the map when a pushpin is added. If it is false then the map will centered at 0,0.

input.name: maxLocations
input.description: Maximum number of locations to return

input.name: latitude
input.description: The latitude for the center of the map view

input.name: longitude
input.description: The longitude for the center of the map view

input.name: zoom
input.description: The zoom level of the map (2D mode only), zoom levels are 1-19 with 1 being street level and 19 the entire world.

input.name: altitude
input.description: Altitude, in meters, above the ground (3D mode only)

input.name: pitch
input.description: The pitch of the view, in degrees. A value of –90 is straight down and a value of 0 is level. (3D mode only)

input.name: heading
input.description: The heading of the view, in compass degrees. A value of 0 or 360 is true north. (3D mode only)

operation.name: deleteAllPushpins
operation.description: Deletes all pushpins from the map.

property.name: defaultZoomLevel
property.description: Set the zoom level of the map (2D mode only). The range allowed of values is 1 (World View) to 19 (Street Level).

property.name: usePhotoUrlAsIcon
property.description: Use the Url input as the pins icon on the map
